#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#define ll long long int
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int i,k,l,n,m,t;
double j;
char h[5],mm[5];
cin>>t;
while(t--){
cin>>h>>mm;
//m = 0;

    m = ((h[0]-48) * 10 ) + (h[1]-48);
    n = ((mm[0]-48)*10) + (mm[1]-48);
    //cout<<m<<" "<<n<<endl;
    if((n >= 0 && n <= 59) && (m >=0 && m <= 23) && (strlen(h) == 2) && (strlen(mm) == 2)) {
//    if(h[0] == '0' || h[0] == '1' || (h[0] == '2' && h[1] <= '3')){
//        if (mm[0] >= '0' && mm[0] <= '5')
//    {

            if(m >= 12 )
            m = m - 12;
            j = (double)(30*m - ((11*n)/2.0));
            if(j < 0.0)
            j = j + 360.0 ;
            if( j >= 180.0)
                j = 360.0 - j;
            else if(j >= 360.0)
            j = 720.0 - j;

        printf("%.1f\n",j);
    }


    else
    cout<<"Invalid Time"<<endl;
    }return 0;

}
